item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Incident
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Incident Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Incident data type models a single virtual server or physical hardware network monitoring event. SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Incidents are created when the SoftLayer monitoring system detects a service down on your hardware of virtual server. As the incident is resolved it’s status changes from “SERVICE FAILURE” to “COMPLETED”. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware::getNetworkMonitorIncidents SoftLayer_Hardware::getActiveNetworkMonitorIncident SoftLayer_Hardware::getLatestNetworkMonitorIncident SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest::getNetworkMonitorIncidents SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest::getActiveNetworkMonitorIncident SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest::getLatestNetworkMonitorIncident Local status A network monitoring incident's status, either the string "

As the incident is resolved it’s status changes from “SERVICE FAILURE” to “COMPLETED”.
